title: Business Day Calculator
subtitle: Tools to calculate dates based on the number of working days.
instructions_box1: Enter a start date and end date to get the number of business days between the two dates.
instructions_box2: Enter a start date and a number of business days to count forward.
instructions_box3: Enter an end date and a number of business days to count backwards.
footer: Created by Gordon and Cody Bonnar with code by OscarGarcia and licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0
